items.title: Is Apple Inc. (AAPL) the Worst Blue Chip Stock to Buy?
items.description: We recently published a list of 10 Worst Blue Chip Stocks to Buy. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) stands against other worst blue chip stocks to buy. As per Niamh Brodie-Machura, Co-Chief Investment Officer at Fidelity International, the effect of tariffs is expected to shift [â€¦]
